name: AI-FinForecaster - Financial Forecasting Web App
summary: Developed FastAPI + Prophet backend and Next.js dashboard for 30-360 day revenue projections with CSV/PDF export and CI pipeline on Railway.
description: A comprehensive financial forecasting application that uses Facebook's Prophet algorithm to provide accurate revenue projections. Features include interactive dashboards, multiple export formats, and automated CI/CD deployment.
impact: Provides 30-360 day revenue forecasting with high accuracy
Automated CI pipeline for rapid development iterations
Multiple export formats for business reporting

images.alt: Financial forecasting dashboard with interactive charts
images.caption: Interactive dashboard showing revenue projections and trends
Advanced forecasting parameters and model configuration

images.alt: Export functionality with CSV and PDF options
images.caption: Flexible export options for business reporting

metrics.label: Forecast Range
metrics.description: Flexible forecasting periods for different business needs

metrics.label: Deployment Speed
metrics.description: CI pipeline on Railway for quick updates

metrics.label: Export Formats
metrics.description: Multiple formats for data analysis and reporting
